effect_entries.effect: Teaches Bullet Seed to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Venoshock to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Bullet Seed Gen II: Psych Up Gen I: Take Down)

flavor_text_entries.text:
特殊な　毒液を　浴びせかける。
毒状態の　相手には
威力が　２倍に　なる。

The user drenches the target in a special
poisonous liquid. This move’s power is
doubled if the target is poisoned.

Lancia uno speciale liquido tossico sul bersaglio.
Se questi è avvelenato, il danno provocato
raddoppia.

Quien lo usa genera un terremoto que afecta a
los Pokémon de alrededor en combate.

Überschüttet das Ziel mit einer speziellen
toxischen Flüssigkeit. Doppelt so stark gegen
bereits vergiftete Ziele.

Le lanceur inocule un poison spécial à l’ennemi.
L’effet est doublé si l’ennemi est déjà
empoisonné.

특수한 독액을 날린다.
독 상태의 상대에게는
위력이 2배가 된다.

とくしゅな　どくえきを　あびせる。
どく　じょうたいの　あいてには
いりょくが　２ばいに　なる。

The user drenches the target in a
special poisonous liquid. Its power
is doubled if the target is poisoned.

The user drenches the target in a
special poisonous liquid. Its power
is doubled if the target is poisoned.

Le lanceur inocule un poison spécial
à l’ennemi. L’effet est doublé si
l’ennemi est déjà empoisonné.

The user forcefully shoots seeds at
the foe. Two to five seeds are shot in
rapid succession.

The user forcefully shoots seeds at
the foe. Two to five seeds are shot in
rapid succession.

The user forcefully shoots seeds at
the foe. Two to five seeds are shot in
rapid succession.

The user shoots
seeds at the foe.
Two to five seeds
are shot at once.

Shoots 2 to 5 seeds
in a row to strike
the foe.

Shoots 2 to 5 seeds
in a row to strike
the foe.
